## 🙋‍♂️ About Me

- 👨‍💻 System Administrator since **2020**
- 🏠 HomeLab Enthusiast: Building, ,experimenting, breaking, and refining infrastructures [HomeLab](#-the-homelab-chronicles-)!
- 🗝️ Automation Advocate: If it can be automated, it’s on my list (sometimes even the ones that stubbornly resist).
- 🔐 Open Source & Security Buff: Passionate about all things Linux, open source, and ensuring our digital realms stay secure.
- ☁️ Hybrid Solutions Fan: On-premises? Cloud? Why not both! I’m all in for mixing the best of both worlds.
- 💡 Always Experimenting: Whether it’s monitoring, CI/CD, or container orchestration, I love diving into new tech adventures. Feel free to reach out if you want to chat about IT innovations or share tales from your own HomeLab escapades!

## 🧑‍🔬 The HomeLab Chronicles 🤓

> Welcome to my HomeLab—a place where engineering brilliance meets "Oh wow, why is this not working again?"

### My (Digital) Kingdom

- **Raspberry Pi Talos Clusters – Prod & Dev:**  
  Armed with Compute Modules 4 and 5 running on ComputeBlades, these micro dynamos orchestrate chaos with Rook/Ceph as their trusty storage backbone. Tiny but mighty! 🛠️🍓
  
- **Enterprise-ish Network:**  
  A Frankenstein’s monster of vendor love:
  - **Unifi**: Covering WiFi, cameras, and IoT serenades
  - **MikroTik & Ruckus switches**: Because one brand is too easy
  - **Firewalls in flux:** Migrating from pfSense to OPNsense because we all need some existential troubleshooting in our lives  

- **High-octane Networking:** 🚀  
  The backbone is fully **10Gig**, with **25Gig love** reserved for key systems (looking at you, storage and hypervisors). If bandwidth were attention span, my network would be a PhD scholar.

- **Hypervisors to rule them all:**  
  - **vSphere** & **Proxmox**: Coexisting peacefully—for now.
  - Hardware: HP Gen9 servers, sleek Dell Gen15 machines, and some spry older **Supermicro servers** lurking in the corner. Perfect for when I need to test something wild and dangerous on bare metal. 🔧💻

### Guides & Stories

<details>
  <summary>Want a peek into the madness? 🤫</summary>
  
  This is just the teaser trailer—detailed guides, war stories, and lessons learned will be coming soon to a blog or repo near you. Stay tuned! 🚧
  
  I will share some stories in the future

</details>

⬢ _Because life is better when it's configured, overengineered, and occasionally on fire._
